tasks.all: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check        && deno task readme && deno task test          && deno task coverage
tasks.all-reload: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check-reload && deno task readme && deno task test --reload && deno task coverage --reload
tasks.readme: touch README.md && chmod +w README.md && ./readme/generate-readme.ts readme/README.md > README.md && deno fmt README.md; chmod -w README.md
tasks.release: deno task all && test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" && GITHUB_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) deno run --allow-env=GITHUB_TOKEN --allow-net=api.github.com --allow-run=bash https://deno.land/x/shipit@0.6.1/shipit.ts
tasks.udd: deno task foreach-file -- deno run --allow-read=. --allow-write=. --allow-net --allow-run=deno https://deno.land/x/udd@0.8.2/main.ts --test "deno task all" '{}'
tasks.udd-no-test: deno task foreach-file -- deno run --allow-read=. --allow-write=. --allow-net --allow-run=deno https://deno.land/x/udd@0.8.2/main.ts                          '{}'
tasks.on-file-save: sh -c 'err=$(NO_COLOR=1 deno fmt "$1" 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 0 ] || [ "$err" != "error: No target files found." ]; then echo "$err"; fi; if [ "$(echo "$1" | cut -c 1-7)" = "readme/" ]; then deno task readme; fi' -s
